title: Breaking the Healing Code
description: Author, International Speaker, Leadership Coach and Pastor, Christopher-Charles Chaney becomes a friend across the pages of Breaking the Healing Code by inviting readers to learn about the spiritual root causes of sicknesses and how to regain their health. This is not just another book on healing. This is a definitive guide in layman's terms to learn how to apply Scripture and start on the Biblical journey to healing. Breaking the Healing Code is a must for counselors, lay leaders, pastors, healing ministers, and individuals desiring to see divine healing in the Kingdom of God.
author: Christopher-Charles Chaney
